name: The Last Straw (Nurobit Games)
description:
He might have been forgotten, but he won't stay that way.

Darkness has fallen over the Kellman family farm. It use to be a peaceful place, but now evil lurks deep in the fields. Terrified for their lives, the family has taken refuge in the barn. They’ve been stuck for days and are hungry. It’s up to you harvest the crops to feed them, or die trying.

Goal: Harvest your crops (SPACEBAR) as fast as you can while avoiding scarecrows that have come to take revenge upon your family. They'll relentlessly hunt you while you collect food needed to survive. When you think you've collected all that you can, take it back to your barn to save it and head back out for more. Getting hit 3 times will be the end of your harvest... for good.

Controls: (Keyboard and Controller both supported)

W-A-S-D: Drive the harvester around.

Space / A: Lower the harvester and collect crops as your run over them.

Designed and created for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam: Harvest.
